long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING. DealSpy helps you compare the prices of smartphones across three e-commerce websites; Amazon, Flipkart, and Chroma. It only supports products listed in India.
